name: Moneybags
description:
Grab all the money and escape without getting caught!

Moneybags is fast paced stealth game where you have to dodge security cameras, guards and spotlights to collect money, before bringing them back to your helicopter.

---

Design, Art, Code by Carl Farra

---

Music and Sound Attributions:

- Spy Glass by Kevin MacLeod

- Click2 by Sebastian

- Close Door by Caroline Ford

- Coin Drop by Willem Hunt
